title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.9 - Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.9 - Reimbursement

State Regulations

Expenditures for the costs of offering, arranging and
furnishing social and educational family-planning services by social services
staff or by arrangement with an outside resource shall be subject to State
reimbursement as social service in accordance with provision of section
153
of the

Social Services Law. Federal financial participation shall be claimed for all
such expenditures effective January 1, 1973, at the rate of 90 percent on
behalf of recipients of ADC, and at the rate of 75 percent on behalf of
recipients of SSI benefits, including salaries, fringe benefits, and travel
costs of service workers and their supervisors giving full-time to services and
of other staff entirely engaged in developing, planning and evaluation
services; salary costs of service-related staff, such as supervisors, clerks, secretaries and stenographers, which represent that portion of the time spent
in supporting full-time service staff; and all indirect costs which have been
allocated in accordance with an approved cost allocation plan and with the
requirements of OMB Circular A-87. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
463.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
